Traits.Name: Receive Orders
Traits.Description: When this unit starts its turn in range of a command aura, it recharges all its abilities.

Traits.Name: Brace
Traits.Description: When adjacent to cover, increase the range of all ranged attacks with a listed range by +3, and increase all line attacks by +3.

Actions.Name: Deploy Cover
Actions.Description: The sniper creates a space of height 1 terrain in an adjacent space.
